mapper.select: Select * From schedule Where courseID=#{courseId} ORDER BY courseID, scheduleID
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO schedule (courseID, courseTime, arrangement) VALUES (#{courseID}, #{courseTime}, #{arrangement})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM schedule WHERE courseID=#{courseID} AND scheduleID=#{scheduleID}
mapper.update: UPDATE schedule SET arrangement=#{arrangement}, courseTime=#{courseTime} WHERE courseID=#{courseID} AND scheduleID=#{scheduleID}
